member.name: M:Webassistenten_ads_api.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Upload API controller.

member.name: M:Webassistenten_ads_api.Controllers.UploadAPIController.Upload
member.summary:
Accepts a pdf file with an ad, along with the required and optional parameters for ads.
Parameters go in the HTTP-Post Request (MIME-Multipart).
Could potentially accept parameters in object form in the future, but does not do that at the moment due to binding issues in Web API.
